channel.title: Logseq on Alex's personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Logseq on Alex's personal blog

item.title: Go Logseq: Build my 2nd brain
item.description: <img src="http://example.com/image.jpg" width="200" height="100"> <img src="https://pub-d12326d6dec844d18197aa640f372de8.r2.dev/logseq-logo.jpeg" style="width:200px; height:100px;"> Motivation to migrate I started jotting down my notes digitally and plain text base for a while long time, I just wanted it simple, then one work.md and day.md started bloating, naturally I divide them into separate files for different purpose, e.g. “stock-trading-record”, “vim/tmux cheatsheet”, “linux common commands” etc, then I’ve got too many files and I often ended with lots similar and overlaps files.
